description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in VvvebJs before version 1.7.7, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code and obtain sensitive information via the action parameter in save.php.

Vulnerabilidad reflejada de cross-site scripting (XSS) en VvvebJs anteriores a la versión 1.7.7, permite a atacantes remotos ejecutar código arbitrario y obtener información confidencial a través del parámetro de acción en save.php.
